bin.control

Class GamePlayController

  • java.lang.Object
    • bin.control.FXController
      • bin.control.GamePlayController
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    javafx.fxml.Initializable

    public class GamePlayController
extends FXController
    Main game play controller. It's the most difficult. Here're all game logic.
    Since:
    v. 1.0
    Author:
    Dmitriy Meleshko

    • Field Detail

      • primaryStage

        private javafx.stage.Stage primaryStage
        Link to primary stage. Here it's used for attaching event handlers such as key handlers.

      • CELL_SIZE

        private static final int CELL_SIZE
        Size of one cell. It's quite important constant, it's used when controller redraws game field.
        See Also:
        redrawField(), Constant Field Values

      • CIRCLE_SIZE

        @Deprecated
private static final int CIRCLE_SIZE
        Deprecated. because circle at the start is quite ugly.
        Size of start circle. Will be removed in next version.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • levelIsLoaded

        private boolean levelIsLoaded
        Name of this field says about itself - it's false when level isn't loaded, and true when level is already loaded. It's used when redrawing field: if it's first redraw set pointerX and pointerY to start values.

      • pointerX

        private int pointerX
        This pointer points, on what X co-ord is it now. Note: it's a co-ord on canvas, not on level.

      • pointerY

        private int pointerY
        This pointer points, on what Y co-ord is it now. Note: it's a co-ord on canvas, not on level.

      • level

        2D grid of level.

        Width of level. Note: it's size of grid, not of level.

      • levelHeight

        private int levelHeight
        Height of level. Note: it's size of grid, not of level.

      • movingPointer

        private boolean movingPointer
        This' variables name says about himself like levelIsLoaded. It's used to make game pointer move just in one direction on one keypress.

      • gameCanvas

        private javafx.scene.canvas.Canvas gameCanvas
        Game canvas from .fxml file.

      • graphics

        private javafx.scene.canvas.GraphicsContext graphics
        Link to gameCanvas' graphics. Just for time economy.

      • undoStack

        private LIFOQueue<java.lang.String> undoStack
        Undo stack for moves. When you press Ctrl+Z - this code runs: 
        
 if (movingPointer) return;

 String move = undoStack.pop();

 if (move == null) return;
 redoStack.push(move);

 if (movingPointer) return;

 pointerMoveAnimation = new PointerMoveAnimation(invertMove(move));
 pointerMoveAnimation.start();
        Where invertMove(String) is function, that inverts direction of move by this schema: 
        
 A <----> D
 W <----> S
        As you can see - Strings are moves/key chars.

        Note: this stack appends when you move.

      • redoStack

        private LIFOQueue<java.lang.String> redoStack
        Undo stack for moves. When you press Ctrl+R - this code runs: 
        
 if (movingPointer) return;

 String move = redoStack.pop();

 if (move == null) return;
 undoStack.push(move);


 pointerMoveAnimation = new PointerMoveAnimation(move);
 pointerMoveAnimation.start();
        Where invertMove(String) is function, that inverts direction of move by this schema: 
        
 A <----> D
 W <----> S
        As you can see - Strings are moves/key chars.

      • exitDialog

        private javafx.scene.control.Alert exitDialog
        Exit dialog object.

      • GP_MOVE_EVENT_HANDLER

        private final javafx.event.EventHandler<javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent> GP_MOVE_EVENT_HANDLER
        Handler for key input. Extracted to object because I need to remove it from list of handlers when actionButtonPressed(ActionEvent) receives action from "end game" button.

      • ACTION_SAFE_LAUNCH_DELAY

        private static final int ACTION_SAFE_LAUNCH_DELAY
        Delay between such actions as redo, undo, and step. This's used for protecting this actions from removing data when I don't need to do this.
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

      • delay

        private void delay(long howLong)
        Safe wrapper for Thread.sleep(long).
        Parameters:
        howLong - delay time in milliseconds
        Throws:
        java.lang.RuntimeException - if catches InterruptedException, and sets cause to caught InterruptedException.

      • setupAnimations

        private void setupAnimations()
        Setups animations, such as controlling GP. Activates after end of field draw animation.

      • init

        public void init()
        Description copied from class: FXController
        Alternative for method initialize in standard JavaFX controllers. But, there's a difference. When Main.changeScene(String, String) changes scene - this method activates.
        Specified by:
        init in class FXController

      • drawFinish

        private void drawFinish(int x,
                        int y)
        Draws finish cell. Finish is 4x4 grid in cell. And, for drawing finish columns as normal, I use variable fillColumnShift. When loop for y axis starts, variable fillBlack sets to shift variable. When this loop ends, fillColumnShift inverts.
        Parameters:
        x - x of cell
        y - y of cell

      • redrawFieldCell

        private void redrawFieldCell(int x,
                             int y)
        Redraws one cell on field.
        Parameters:
        x - x position of cell. Note: it's position in collection, not in canvas.
        y - y position of cell. Note: it's position in collection, not in canvas.

      • redrawField

        private void redrawField()
        Redraws all field.

      • actionButtonPressed

        public void actionButtonPressed(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
        Event handler for all buttons. Moved in one method because of ActionEvent as param - it was not used.
        Parameters:
        event - action event from button
